name: Puzzle Sigma
description:
A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2021: Joined Together

Play as mathematical operators and build equations in this top down puzzle game.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Q and E to rotate
  • Z to undo
  • R to reset the level

By Jon Topielski (Programming), Thoof (Art) and Beardy (Music, SFX)
